# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/win32-x64/lldb/lib/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pygments/filters/__init__.py
@source-hash: 87f928624505a3e1
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:02:04Z

## Purpose
Filter registry and implementations for Pygments syntax highlighting. Provides token stream transformation filters that modify lexer output, including code tag highlighting, symbol conversion, case transformation, and whitespace visualization.

## Key Functions

**`find_filter_class(filtername)` (L22-29)**
- Looks up filter class by name from FILTERS registry or plugin system
- Returns None if filter not found

**`get_filter_by_name(filtername, **options)` (L32-42)**
- Factory function that instantiates filter with options
- Raises ClassNotFound if filter doesn't exist

**`get_all_filters()` (L45-49)**
- Generator yielding all available filter names from registry and plugins

**`_replace_special(ttype, value, regex, specialttype, replacefunc)` (L52-62)**
- Utility function for regex-based token replacement
- Yields token segments with special regions converted

## Filter Classes

**`CodeTagFilter` (L65-94)**
- Highlights code tags (XXX, TODO, FIXME, BUG, NOTE) in comments/docstrings
- Configurable tag list via 'codetags' option
- Uses Comment.Special token type for highlighting

**`SymbolFilter` (L97-684)**
- Converts mathematical symbols to Unicode characters
- Supports Isabelle and LaTeX symbol systems
- Extensive symbol mapping dictionaries (L111-669)

**`KeywordCaseFilter` (L687-712)**
- Transforms keyword casing (lower/upper/capitalize)
- Uses string methods for transformation

**`NameHighlightFilter` (L715-753)**
- Highlights specific names with custom token types
- Defaults to Name.Function for highlighting

**`RaiseOnErrorTokenFilter` (L760-786)**
- Raises exception when Error tokens encountered
- Configurable exception class

**`VisibleWhitespaceFilter` (L789-865)**
- Makes whitespace visible with Unicode replacements
- Configurable space/tab/newline characters
- Optional Whitespace token type assignment

**`GobbleFilter` (L868-904)**
- Removes fixed number of characters from line starts
- Useful for dedenting source code

**`TokenMergeFilter` (L907-928)**
- Merges consecutive tokens of same type
- Optimizes token stream

## Registry
**`FILTERS` (L931-940)** - Main filter name-to-class mapping dictionary

## Dependencies
- `pip._vendor.pygments.token` for token types
- `pip._vendor.pygments.filter` for base Filter class
- `pip._vendor.pygments.util` for option parsing helpers
- `pip._vendor.pygments.plugin` for plugin discovery

## Architecture Notes
- All filters inherit from Filter base class
- Common pattern: `__init__` processes options, `filter()` transforms token stream
- Token streams are (token_type, value) tuples
- Filters yield modified streams using generators
